item.title: Firings at the U.S. weather and oceans agency risk lives and the economy, former agency heads warn
item.description: Massive firings at the NOAA will likely cause needless deaths and a big hit to America's economy, according to the people who ran it.

item.title: Norway plans to raise financial support for Ukraine, prime minister says
Watch: Trump holds joint press conference with British Prime Minister Keir Starmer
item.description: President Donald Trump and British Prime Minister Keir Starmer held a joint press conference at the White House on Thursday.

item.title: Zelenskyy won't apologize to Trump, but calls clash 'not good for both sides'
item.description: The Ukraine president spoke on Fox News hours after a loud argument with President Trump and Vice President JD Vance at a White House meeting.

item.title: Zelenskyy leaves White House after Ukraine talks collapse
item.description: A deal President Trump sought to give the United States access to Ukraine rare minerals as part of an effort to end the war with Russia was not signed...
